com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model

Class HelperFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model.HelperFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.io.File>

    public class HelperFile
extends java.io.File
    This class is really helpful for dealing with files in memory. The major difference between this and a regular file (which it extends) is this has a byte[] of its bytes which can be set and therefore you can hand this around as a regular file but treat it like it exists only in memory. The IOHelper and the EmailHelper each have methods which can use this class powerfully.
    See Also:
